The most popular shopping days of the year are just around the corner PERIOD Here are some of the stores you should be checking out this Black Friday and Cyber Monday PERIOD

mediacredit namePhoto courtesy of Mike Mozart Flickr creative commons  alignalignright width300mediacredit

J.C PERIOD PENNEY

J.C PERIOD Penney is coming at you early with Black Friday sales PERIOD Doors open at  p.m PERIOD on Thanksgiving PERIOD

Black Friday J.C PERIOD Penney is known for their killer doorbusters and this year is no exception PERIOD If you get there early on Thanksgiving Day you could receive one of three coupons PERIOD These coupons include  off  or more  off  or more or  off  or more according to J.C PERIOD Penneys official Black Friday advertisement PERIOD

J.C PERIOD Penney carries a little bit of everything PERIOD While there are low prices for things like womens boots J.C PERIOD Penney is also offering low prices on kitchen appliances PERIOD Items such as . toasters . slow cookers and . blenders are just a few of the great deals PERIOD This is a perfect opportunity to get gifts for mom and dad or maybe for your dorm when you come back in January PERIOD

MACYS

After they host their annual parade on Thanksgiving Macys will offer low prices on everything this Cyber Monday PERIOD

Cyber Monday While Macys hasnt officially released what their offers will be on Cyber Monday their official website offers a sneak peek hinting at some items that will definitely be on sale PERIOD If youve ever been in a Macys youre familiar with their extensive coat department filled with an endless supply of designer coats PERIOD From Ralph Lauren to Michael Kors the website suggests there will be major deals for womens coats coming Cyber Monday PERIOD As for men the Macys website suggests a big sale in dress clothes PERIOD Macys will be offering lower prices on everything from suits and pants to dress shirts and wallets making sure you look sharp this holiday season PERIOD

Ongoing deals Macys is also offering free shipping on orders  or more until Feb PERIOD   according to cybermonday PERIOD com PERIOD Macys is also offering a special deal for Mac beauty samples PERIOD For just  you can get sample sizes of lip gloss mascara and eye shadow according to Macys official website PERIOD Macys official Cyber Monday website says that you can take advantage of this deal and free shipping on all beauty orders until Dec PERIOD  PERIOD

SEPHORA

Looking for something to make your look pop this holiday season Sephora is one of the most popular makeup stores and they have some low prices coming your way PERIOD

Cyber Monday With the special code TRYME at checkout all Sephora orders of  receive a free fullsize mask and six mystery samples according to cybermonday.com PERIOD The official website of the online holiday also says that if you use the special code MINISCENT with a purchase of  you will receive a deluxe fragrance sample PERIOD

Ongoing Deals Through Feb PERIOD   Sephora is also offering a special deal of three free samples of your choice on every order PERIOD There is also free shipping on Sephora orders that are  and over according to cybermonday.com PERIOD

TARGET

Need an extra reason to be thankful Take a look at some of Targets Black Friday sales PERIOD Doors open at  p.m PERIOD on Thanksgiving PERIOD

Black Friday Target has deals in almost every department this Black Friday but they have some special deals in electronics PERIOD The biggest reason to shop here is that with some select items you can receive a free Target gift PERIOD For example with the purchase of an Xbox One for . you will receive a  Target gift card for free PERIOD Other sales include Fitbits for . percent off all Apple TV models and Beats Solo2 wireless headphones for . according to Targets official Black Friday ad PERIOD
